items.sentence: My uncle went to Mexico in 1983 and never returned.
Because of the storm, the ship couldn't leave port.
Because it started raining hard, we played indoors.
If you see the cat in this picture, please call us.
I think that Tom knows that it was me who did that.
I asked Tom if I could have another slice of pizza.
Tom wasn't shouting at Mary. He was shouting at me.
My aunt asked me to buy her a music box from Italy.
I've decided that I'll go back to Boston by myself.
I heard that Tom came back to Boston for Christmas.
